attributes.background: Natural products including plants have been used for thousands of years to treat and manage a variety of medical conditions yet a number of these products; such as cannabis and psilocybin mushrooms, are illegal to possess and use.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you mean by natural products.

If you specifically want to change what is illegal under drugs laws, you might want to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241023

You may also want to sign this specific petition relating to the legalisation of cannabis:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254812
